data.meta_description: Your story is waiting to unfold in the heart of Uptown Charlotte. Brimming with relentless charm, glamorous design and artful experiences, you canât help but explore the wonderful twists, turns and scenic perches of the Grand Bohemian Hotel Charlotte
data.text:
More

Located in the heart of uptown Charlotte, NC, Grand Bohemian Hotel Charlotte continues The Kessler Collectionâs award-winning commitment to providing superior guest services, Bohemian inspiration and artistic offerings. Set to debut early 2020, the highly anticipated 254-room hotel will take center stage as the areaâs newest luxury icon, boasting 32 suites, a rejuvenating Poseidon Spa, versatile indoor and outdoor event spaces, a Starbucks coffee shop, an open kitchen restaurant concept and lounge/bar with charming sidewalk and park seating, as well as a sophisticated executive lounge and rooftop bar both on the 16th floor, providing intimate spaces and unparalleled views of the âQueen City.â
